channel.title: Implementation on Edge SDK
channel.description: Recent content in Implementation on Edge SDK

item.title: iOS
item.description: The Edge library is offered as a dynamic framework. The easiest way to install it is through Cocoapods. Requirements & Restrictions Your deployment target has to be set to iOS 15 or higher. Installation Cocoapods The EdgeSDK has two dependencies to other private frameworks (Innolib and SignifyIndoorPositioning). To get access to the EdgeSDK and its dependencies, you need to have access to the Github organization ‘Edge-Connect-SDK’, and more specifically to the iOS repository in there: https://github.
